section.heading: Notice of request for formal probate; form.

para.text: When given. – A person filing a petition for formal probate shall promptly give notice to all known interested persons. In addition, the petitioner shall publish a notice once a week for 2 successive weeks in a legal periodical of general circulation in the District or in any other publication the Court may provide by Rule.

para.heading: Form of notice. —
para.text: The notice required by this section shall be in the form prescribed by the Rules.

annotations.annotation: This section is referenced in § 20-311 and § 20-321.
